text: Wendelin Rauch Wendelin Rauch (30 August 1885 - 28 April 1954) was a German Roman Catholic clergyman. Rauch was born in Zell am Andelsbach. who served as archbishop of Freiburg from 1948 until his death at Freiburg im Breisgau, aged 68. ==References== == External links== * * Rauch on catholic-hierarchy.org Category:Archbishops of Freiburg Category:1885 births Category:1954 deaths Category:People from Pfullendorf Category:20th-century Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Wendelin Rauch
